overview: Whether they are single, as a couple or with friends, they have decided to spend the afternoon in a libertine spa. If some are regulars, others will be able to discover all the little secrets that hide behind the doors of the establishment. Some come as a couple to meet new people, others are terribly excited when they feel observed having sex while some simply want to try a new experience. But one thing brings them together, they all came to spice up their sex life...
title: Libertine Spa
